title: The Heroic Week of Ivan Butler: The Knitting Visionary
summary: Ivan Butler, a 59-year-old superhero with a passion for knitting and publicizing, uses his unique powers to save his city from a mystical threat over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Ivan Butler, ein 59-jähriger Superheld mit einer Leidenschaft für Stricken und Publizieren, verwendet seine einzigartigen Kräfte, um seine Stadt im Laufe einer Woche vor einer mystischen Bedrohung zu retten.
summaryDutch: Ivan Butler, een 59-jarige superheld met een passie voor breien en publiceren, gebruikt zijn unieke krachten om zijn stad te redden van een mystieke bedreiging gedurende een week.
summaryFrench: Ivan Butler, un super-héros de 59 ans passionné de tricot et de publication, utilise ses pouvoirs uniques pour sauver sa ville d'une menace mystique au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Ivan Butler discovers ancient yarn in his knitting shop which grants him the power to weave protective shields out of thin air.
Using his newfound powers, Ivan creates a huge public art display, unwittingly trapping a lurking mystical creature.
The creature reveals it's only trying to return to its realm. Ivan feels a bond, as he too feels misplaced in his desire to be both a hero and a craftsman.
Ivan publicizes the creature's plight. The city rallies to his cause, inspired by his compassionate approach.
Together with the city's support, Ivan knits a massive gateway to help the creature return home.
As the gateway opens, Ivan and the creature share a peaceful moment, reflecting on their week together.
The creature departs, and the city celebrates Ivan's bravery. Ivan realizes his shop and his publicizing skills can serve greater goods.

ending: With the mystical threat gone and his city safe, Ivan Butler continued to balance his life between his hobbies and heroism.
moral: Even unusual hobbies can reveal extraordinary talents and lead to unexpected heroism.
